page.title: 16Sports in Occold.
page.content: The sports in Occold are quite varied. One of the most popular sports that people do is football. There are 21 people who like playing football in our School.Other sports are swimming,tennis ballet,fishing,horse riding,gymnastics and judo.We have not got many sports facilities in Occold but we have got table tennis and football,but for most the sports we have to go out of Occold. I have done a Mini-marathon and this year two of my friends are having a go at it.You have to do a lot of training for a Mini-marathon. It's so nerve racking when you are lined up at the start,the starting gun goes and you are off. You should go at a steady pace because going too fast you could wear yourself out. You have about 13 check- outs along the way,one every mile.When you have finished you feel really good because you have completed it.
